titles.title: To provide an additional appropriation for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program, and for other purposes.
To provide an additional appropriation for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: This bill makes additional appropriations for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program to provide shelter and other services to families and individuals encountered by the Department of Homeland Security (e.g., migrants).
